Class Obstacle

java.lang.Object
  Obstacle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Item
Direct Known Subclasses:
FireObstacle, SpringObstacle
public class Obstacle
extends java.lang.Object
implements Item

An Obstacle is an Item that cannot move but has the ability of hurting or slowing opponents' progresses against the owning Player.

Author:
Ayush Mehra, Vincent Yang

Constructor Detail

Obstacle

public Obstacle(Player player,
                Player opponent,
                java.awt.Image[] animatedObstacle,
                int row,
                int col)
Constructs a new Obstacle

Parameters:
player - the Player that owns the Obstacle
opponent - the Player against the Player that owns the Obstacle.
animatedObstacle - the set of images that represent an Obstacle in its normal state.
row - the row in which this Obstacle resides
col - the column in which this Obstacle resides.
